Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Shaun Livingston?

Shaun Livingston is 39 years old.

Where was Shaun Livingston born?

Shaun Livingston was born in Peoria, Illinois.

When was Shaun Livingston born?

Shaun Livingston was born on September 11, 1985.

How tall is Shaun Livingston?

Shaun Livingston is 6-7 (201 cm) tall.

How much did Shaun Livingston weigh when playing?

Shaun Livingston weighed 192 lbs (87 kg) when playing.

Is Shaun Livingston in the Hall of Fame?

Shaun Livingston is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Shaun Livingston drafted?

Shaun Livingston was drafted by Los Angeles Clippers, 1st round (4th pick, 4th overall), 2004 NBA Draft.

What position did Shaun Livingston play?

Point Guard and Shooting Guard.

When did Shaun Livingston retire?

Shaun Livingston last played in 2019.

What is Shaun Livingston's net worth?

Shaun Livingston made at least $59,764,379 playing professional basketball.

How much did Shaun Livingston make?

Shaun Livingston made $8,307,692 in 2019.

What did Shaun Livingston average?

Shaun Livingston averaged 6.3 points, 2.4 rebounds, and 3.0 assists per game.

How many rings does Shaun Livingston have?

Shaun Livingston won 3 championships.

What is Shaun Livingston's Twitter account?

Shaun Livingston is on Twitter at ShaunLivingston.

What schools did Shaun Livingston attend?

Shaun Livingston attended Peoria Central in Peoria, Illinois.

What are Shaun Livingston's nicknames?

S Dot is a nickname for Shaun Livingston.
